episode: I felt confident this weekend running up and down a mountain near my house.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I felt confident while running up and down a mountain this past weekend.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like an amazing feeling and a great accomplishment!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks.  Trail running does feel amazing!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like a rush of freedom, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, out in the middle of no where relying on yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so empowering!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have been trail running for many years so I have the skills to do it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Experience definitely helps, must be nice to feel so self-assured.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: When I am running on top of mountain ridges, I feel like I can do anything.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's incredible, you must feel on top of the world!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Both figuratively and literally, haha

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Love the pun!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I had done this loop dozens of times before.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: So it's a familiar and comforting route for you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, it is near my house.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Convenient and beautiful, nice combo!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Great exercise for the mind, body, and soul too.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Totally rejuvenating, I'm sure!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I knew I had the skills and experience to do it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That confidence boost is the best!
